name: EntityGrid
title: Entity Grid
description: A specialized grid component that displays all entities in the system using the generic DataGrid component
functionalRequirements:
## Simple Entity Viewer

### Purpose
- Provide a zero-configuration grid for viewing system entities
- Demonstrate simple composition by wrapping DataGrid
- Automatically load and display all entities

### Key Features
- Auto-loads all entities on mount
- Pre-configured optimal columns for entity display
- All DataGrid features available (filtering, sorting, paging)
- No configuration needed - just drop in and use
technicalDesign:
## Minimal Wrapper Design

### Architecture
- Ultra-thin wrapper around DataGrid
- Uses RunView to fetch entities
- Passes data directly to DataGrid
- No props or events - purely self-contained

### Registry Pattern
- Loads DataGrid from components registry
- Shows component composition without coupling

entities.usageContext: Display all system entities in a filterable, sortable grid
